John Okechukwuemeka, ma ọ bụ Okechukwu Emeka, (amụrụ ubochi iri na asato n' ọnwa Julaị n’afọ 1962) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, bụrụbu onye minista na-ahụ maka njem ụgbọ njem, onye a họpụtara ime iwu nke  Anambra North na steeti Anambra,Naijiria na ntuli aka izugbe nke ọnwa Eprel n’afọ 2011, na-azọ ọkwa na People's Democratic Party (PDP) ) ikpo okwu.

A mụrụ Prince John Okechukwuemeka na ubochi iri na asato  n' ọnwa Julaị n’afọ 1962.
Ọ gara Columbia College of Missouri (1984-1987) ebe ọ nwetara MSc na Business Administration.
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa - Ọrụ na Nigeria Commercial and Industrial Enterprises (1987-1990), mgbe ahụ onye isi nchịkịta na onye isi nchịka (1990-1993) nke otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Site na 1993 ruo 2007 ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa na onye isi nchịk nke Fichtel & Sachs (West Africa) Ltd.

N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2007, a họpụtara Okechukwuemeka ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Steeti maka njem na kọmitii nke Onye isi ala Umaru Yar'Adua.
A chụpụrụ ya n'ọkwa a n'ụzọ dị ukwuu na 29 Ọktoba 2008.
Okechukwuemeka bụ onye na-ahụ maka njem mmiri.
A họpụtara Prince Emeka ka ọ bụrụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye omeiwu nke Anambra North na ntuli aka mba nke Eprel 2011, na-emeri vootu 1,156

N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2011, ọ rịọrọ ndị Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) na  Onye isi nyocha nke ndị uwe ojii, na-ekwu na onye ome iwu Alphonsus Igbeke gbalịrị iji aghụghọ dochie aha ya na ndepụta nke ndị na-azọ ọkwa, n'agbanyeghị na ọ meriri ihe na-erughị 100 vootu.
Na ntuli aka Eprel 2011, Emeka meriri vootu 60,788, n'ihu onye nke abụọ Joy Emordi nke All Progressives Grand Alliance (APGA) na vootu 54,060 na J
Balohun nke Action Congress nke Naijiria na vootu 17,849.
